alert.note: Alert for Furnas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 2:21PM CDT until May 29 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Hastings NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... Republican River At Cambridge affecting Furnas County. For the REPUBLICAN RIVER...including Cambridge...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Republican River At Cambridge. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs as the right bank overflows. Water will start flowing through sloughs south of the main channel. At 10.0 feet, The left bank overflows causing additional lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 1.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 10.6 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.2 feet on 05/25/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
